languages.text:
"Знаешь, Станцо, скучаю по временам, когда огневые культиваторы использовались только для обработки просек. Я вот раньше как думал? Гребаный лес, Трон его побери, ни на день без присмотра не оставишь! Чуть что — сразу производству мешает. А нынче... Вон оно как повернулось: кроме клятого леса людей и защитить-то некому. И пройти через него можем только мы, сильвариусы, да и то — если огнекультиватор цел. Хотя слышал я, что кто-то из астропатов умудрился провести через чащу полсотни человек, но больше о них вестей не было. Не иначе как враги Человечества добрались...{br}
В общем, выходи встречать. Веду новую группу, а прометий в культиваторе кончается".

traits.locale_text:
"Знаешь, Станцо, скучаю по временам, когда огневые культиваторы использовались только для обработки просек. Я вот раньше как думал? Гребаный лес, Трон его побери, ни на день без присмотра не оставишь! Чуть что — сразу производству мешает. А нынче… Вон оно как повернулось: кроме клятого леса людей и защитить-то некому. И пройти через него можем только мы, сильвариусы, да и то — если огнекультиватор цел. Хотя слышал я, что кто-то из астропатов умудрился провести через чащу полсотни человек, но больше о них вестей не было. Не иначе как враги Человечества добрались…{br}
В общем, выходи встречать. Веду новую группу, а прометий в культиваторе кончается".

languages.text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."
languages.original_text:
"Знаешь, Станцо, скучаю по временам, когда огневые культиваторы использовались только для обработки просек. Я вот раньше как думал? traits.locale_text:
"You know, Stanzo,I miss the times when the fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a sec, or else it'd mess with the production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can actually defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the thicket, but nobody had ever heard from them since. The Enemies of Mankind got their hands on them, didn't they...{br}
Well, come and say hello. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

languages.text:
«¿Te digo una cosa, Stanzo? Echo de menos los días en que los cultivadores de fuego solo se utilizaban para trabajar el campo. Mira que por aquel entonces yo pensaba: "¡Por el Trono, condenado bosque! No puedes apartarle la mirada ni un momento o te estropea la producción". Pero hoy en día... ese condenado bosque es lo único que protege a la gente. ¿Quién lo iba a decir? Y nosotros, los Silvarius, somos los únicos que podemos atravesarlo... teniendo un cultivador de fuego intacto, claro está. Lo que sí he oído es que uno de los Astrópatas guio a una cincuentena de personas fuera de la espesura, pero nadie ha vuelto a tener noticias suyas desde entonces. Los enemigos de la Humanidad les echaron el guante, seguramente...{br}
En fin, pásate a saludar cuando puedas. Estoy a cargo de un nuevo grupo, y nos queda poco prometio para el cultivador».
languages.original_text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

traits.locale_text:
«¿Te digo una cosa, Stanzo? Echo de menos los días en que los cultivadores de fuego solo se utilizaban para trabajar el campo. Mira que por aquel entonces yo pensaba: "¡Por el Trono, condenado bosque! No puedes apartarle la mirada ni un segundo o te come la cosecha". Pero hoy en día... ese condenado bosque es lo único que protege a la gente. ¿Quién lo iba a decir? Y nosotros, los Silvarius, somos los únicos que podemos atravesarlo... teniendo un cultivador de fuego intacto, claro está. Lo que sí he oído es que uno de los Astrópatas guio a una cincuentena de personas fuera de la espesura, pero nadie ha vuelto a tener noticias suyas desde entonces. Seguro que los enemigos de la Humanidad les echaron el guante...{br}
En fin, pásate a saludar cuando puedas. Estoy a cargo de un nuevo grupo, y nos queda poco prometio para el cultivador».

languages.text:
“你知道吗，斯坦佐，我真想念以前的日子。那个时候，火耕机只用来在地里干活。那个时候，我脑子里想的都是——黄金王座在上，这该死的森林！我眼睛一秒也不能离开它，否则会影响我工作。可现在……这该死的森林居然是唯一能保护人类的东西，谁能猜得到呢？至于我们，西尔瓦瑞斯家族，只有我们才能穿过森林，前提是我们的火耕机还能用。不过我最近听说，有个星语者成功带领一支五十人的队伍穿过了丛林，但在那之后，再也没有人听说过他们的消息。他们肯定是落到了人类之敌手里，是吧……{br}
好吧，过来打个招呼吧。我正在领导一支新的小队，而且火耕机里的钷素快用完了。”
languages.original_text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

好吧，过来打个招呼吧。我正在领导一支新的小队，而且火耕机里的钷素快用完了。”

languages.text:
« Tu sais, Stanzo, j'ai la nostalgie de l'époque où les lance-flammes ne servaient qu'au travail des champs. Je maudissais souvent cette forêt, parce qu'il fallait constamment la surveiller si on ne voulait pas qu'elle ruine les récoltes. Mais maintenant... cette fichue forêt est la seule chose capable de nous défendre. Si je m'étais douté ! Et nous, les Silvarius, sommes les seuls à pouvoir la traverser... du moins, tant que notre lance-flammes fonctionne. Cela dit, il paraît que l'un des astropathes a réussi à mener un groupe de cinquante personnes à travers les bois, mais depuis, ils n'ont pas donné signe de vie. Les ennemis de l'humanité leur ont sans doute mis la main dessus...{br}
Viens nous rejoindre à mi-chemin. J'ai pris la tête d'un nouveau groupe et je manque de prométhium pour mon lance-flammes. »
languages.original_text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

traits.locale_text:
« Tu sais, Stanzo, j'ai la nostalgie de l'époque où les lance-flammes ne servaient qu'au travail des champs. Je maudissais souvent cette forêt, parce qu'il fallait constamment la surveiller si on ne voulait pas qu'elle ruine les récoltes. Mais maintenant... cette fichue forêt est la seule chose capable de nous défendre. Si je m'étais douté ! Et nous, les Silvarius, sommes les seuls à pouvoir la traverser... du moins, tant que notre lance-flammes fonctionne. Cela dit, j'ai entendu dire que l'un des astropathes avait réussi à mener un groupe de cinquante personnes à travers les bois, mais depuis, ils n'ont pas donné signe de vie. Les ennemis de l'humanité leur ont sans doute mis la main dessus...{br}
Bref, n'hésite pas à passer. J'ai pris la tête d'un nouveau groupe et je manque de prométhium pour mon lance-flammes. »

languages.text:
「なあ、スタンゾ。ファイア・カルティベーターが畑仕事だけに使われていたのが恋しいよ。あの頃は、あのクソ森が！って思ってたもんっだがな。ちょっとでも目を離せばすぐに生産量に支障が出やがる。でも、今は…あのクソ森が、俺たちを守ってくれる唯一のものだ。そんなことになるなんて、誰がわかる？俺たちシルヴァリウスは、それを通り抜けられる唯一の存在なんだ…ファイア・カルティベーターが無傷なら、だがな。ただ、感応通信官の1人が、50人の集団を率いて藪を通り抜けたって噂は聞いた。でも、そいつらの消息はそれ以来耳にしていないけどな。人類の敵が、きっと奴らを…{br}
まあ、ともあれ、挨拶に来てくれよ。俺は新しいグループを率いてるんだが、カルティベーターのプロメチウムが底をつきかけてるんだ」
languages.original_text:

And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

languages.text:
"Wisst Ihr, Stanzo, ich vermisse die Zeiten, in denen die Feuerkultivatoren noch ausschließlich für die Feldarbeit eingesetzt wurden. Damals dachte ich mir: Beim Thron, dieser verdammte Wald! Man kann ihn keine Sekunde aus den Augen lassen, sonst bringt er die ganze Produktion durcheinander. Aber heute ... Der verdammte Wald ist das Einzige, was uns verteidigen kann. Wer hätte das gedacht? Und wir, die Silvarius, sind die Einzigen, die ihn durchqueren können — wenn unser Feuerkultivator denn intakt ist. Angeblich ist es aber einem der Astropathen gelungen, eine Gruppe von fünfzig Leuten durch das Dickicht zu führen. Seitdem hat allerdings nie wieder jemand etwas von ihnen gehört. Die Feinde der Menschheit haben sie erwischt, oder ... {br}
Treffen wir uns auf halbem Weg. Ich führe eine neue Gruppe an, und das Promethium in meinem Kultivator geht langsam zur Neige."
languages.original_text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."

traits.locale_text:
"Wisst Ihr, Stanzo, ich vermisse die Zeiten, in denen die Feuerkultivatoren noch für die Feldarbeit eingesetzt wurden. Damals dachte ich mir: Beim Thron, dieser verdammte Wald! Man kann ihn keine Sekunde aus den Augen lassen, sonst bringt er die ganze Produktion durcheinander. Aber heute ... Der verdammte Wald ist das Einzige, was uns verteidigen kann. Wer hätte das gedacht? Und wir, die Silvarius, sind die Einzigen, die ihn durchqueren können — wenn unser Feuerkultivator denn intakt ist. Ich habe aber gehört, dass es einem der Astropathen gelungen ist, eine Gruppe von fünfzig Leuten durch das Dickicht zu führen. Seitdem hat allerdings nie wieder jemand etwas von ihnen gehört. Die Feinde der Menschheit haben sie in die Finger bekommen, oder ...
Na ja, kommt mal vorbei und sagt hallo. Ich führe eine neue Gruppe an, und das Promethium in meinem Kultivator geht langsam zur Neige."

languages.text:
"Ne var, biliyor musun Stanzo? Yangın söndürücülerin sadece tarlalarda çalışırken kullanıldığı zamanları özlüyorum. O zamanlar "Taht adına, lanet olsun bu ormana! Bir saniye bile gözünü ayırırsan üretimi mahvedersin." diye düşünürdüm. Ama şimdilerde... O lanet olası orman, halkı koruyabilen tek şey. Kimin aklına gelirdi? O ormandan da bir tek Silvarius olarak biz geçebiliyoruz. Tabii ki yangın söndürücülerimiz çalışsaydı... Gerçi kulağıma bir şey çalındı. Astropatlardan biri, elli kişilik bir gruba çalıların arasında yol göstermiş ama o zamandan beri kimse onlardan haber almamış. İnsanlığın düşmanları canlarını aldı, değil mi...{br}
Hadi orta noktada buluşalım. Yeni bir gruba yol göstereceğim ve yangın söndürücümdeki prometyum bitmek üzere."
languages.original_text:
"You know, Stanzo, I miss the times when fire cultivators were only used for working in the fields. Back then, I thought: by the Throne, damn that forest! Can't take your eyes off it for a tick, or else it'd mess with production. But nowadays... The damned forest is the only thing that can defend people. Who'd have guessed? And we, the Silvarius, are the only ones who can pass through it — if we have our fire cultivator intact, that is. I did hear, though, that one of the Astropaths managed to lead a group of fifty people through the brush, but nobody has heard from them since. The enemies of Humanity got them, didn't they...{br}
Come meet us halfway. I'm leading a new group, and the promethium in my cultivator is running out."
